sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard 52-card deck of cards?
message_2:
There is only one King of Hearts in a standard 52-card deck. Therefore, the probability of drawing the King of Hearts is 1 (the number of King of Hearts) divided by 52 (the total number of cards in the deck).

Probability = 1/52 â‰ˆ 0.01923 or 1.923%

So, the probability of drawing a King of Hearts from a standard 52-card deck is approximately 1.923%.
